Option: rename.include_directory_pattern

This option can be used to exclude all directory names but those matching the specified regexp pattern.

Example of usage in the config.php file:

$mcFileManagerConfig['rename.include_directory_pattern'] = "/^onlythis$|^onlythat$/i";

Example of usage in a mc_access file:

rename.include_directory_pattern=/^onlythis$|^onlythat$/i
